name: US Treasury Department
description: The federal agency responsible for issuing US government bonds
keyData: and bills to finance government operations.

name: UK Debt Management Office
description: The executive agency of HM Treasury responsible for managing the UK government's debt and cash management.

name: German Federal Ministry of Finance
description: Responsible for issuing German government bonds (Bunds) through the Federal Finance Agency.

name: Bank of Japan
description: Japan's central bank involved in government bond issuance and monetary policy implementation.

name: European Commission
description: EU institution involved in coordinating government bond issuance for member states and EU programs.
